projects.name: AyoLab
projects.short_desc: Small personal homelab setup to test projects, containers, and get hands-on experience on real-world setups.
projects.long_desc: Personal homelab setup where I setted up various projects like my own cloud Network-Attached Storage with protection, routing, custom firewall settings, custom domain and great availability, my own web hosting setup with CI/CD Pipelines using OneDev Git capabilities and Dockerized containers, NginX to reverse proxy the websites to a public-facing domain, n8n to streamline automations, updates and backups, and crafty-controller to host personal minecraft servers with ZeroTier to manage a closed LAN with my friends

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.short_desc: Full fledged personal portfolio with animations and simulations hosted on my own homelab
projects.long_desc: Portfolio prototyped using Replit design AI and polished with postgresql connection, website optimization, and more.

projects.name: Red Thread
projects.short_desc: World Building native app focused on bringing writers, dungeon masters and story researchers a toolset to help them write their story, characters, and entire worlds with.
projects.long_desc: Focused on optimized performance and offering a wide range of tools, this native app aims to be the toolbox to bring life to your ideas. Being able to link events, characters and places visually will help you keep track of everything in the story.

experiences.title: Software Developer & Part-time Teacher
experiences.short_desc: Software Developer in charge of developping and maintaining their content management platforms and part-time teacher for high school students, teaching side by side with Ivy League graduates.
experiences.long_desc:
Instructed Python, Java and Javascript alongside Ivy League graduates to High-School and University
students. Beginner to Advanced classes.
Developed and Mantained the infraestructure that allowed the company to keep a record of every
student's progress and keep in touch with their respective parents at no aditional cost to the company.
Hosted the database were we kept the student's records in a secure way that allowed fast access for
parents and editing permissions for teachers.

experiences.title: Digital Success Manager
experiences.short_desc: Digital Success Manager for an Artificial Intelligence education program aimed at underserved youth around the world.
experiences.long_desc:
Proactively developed automations to mainstream processes in order to improve speed and reduce
downtime to a minimum, without extra costs to the company.
Spearheaded the digital success and operational efficiency of Junior Achievement's programs utilizing
the IBM SkillsBuild platform.
Provided comprehensive 24/7 IT support, directly troubleshooting platform usage errors for Project
Managers and other teams, resulting in reduced downtime and improved user understanding.
Instrumental in optimizing program engagement and providing accurate reporting on student
participation and progress.
Successfully launched and supported an Artificial Intelligence education program for underserved youth,
training project managers, managing inter-regional communications with IBM, and implementing
automations to streamline key platform processes.

education.title: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
education.description: A Bachelor of Science (B.S.) in Computer Science focused on developing a strong theoretical foundation and practical skills across the entire computing spectrum. This rigorous curriculum emphasized problem-solving, algorithmic thinking, and the design and analysis of complex software systems.

education.title: Azure Fundamentals
education.description: Successfully attained the Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900) certification, demonstrating foundational knowledge of cloud services and how Microsoft Azure provides these services.

certificates.title: Typescript: Tu completa guía y manual de mano.
certificates.description: Full Typescript guide, with advanced type definitions.

skills and clear communication to deliver impactful results, consistently exceeding expectations and meeting
